mapper.sql: msg_id, id, mtime, rtime, drugstype, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into drug_registration (id, mtime, rtime, drugstype, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drugstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into drug_registration
id,
mtime,
rtime,
drugstype,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update drug_registration
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rtime = #{rtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
drugstype = #{drugstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drug_registration set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rtime = #{rtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, drugstype = #{drugstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.msg_id, B.mtime,B.rtime,B.drugstype, P.oldpeople_name from drug_registration B inner join jd_oldpeople P on B.id = P.oldpeople_id
